author: psteitz
msg: Allowed thread count post test to be off by one in DBCP-93 test for JRockit compat.

author: fhanik
msg: Implemented a one time parachute for java heap oom. Should give the system enough room to properly report the error and clear the caches. everything else will be up to the developer at that time

msg: fix bug #40686. thanks bernd fechner for the analysis
